name: Copolymers produced by the polymerization of 6-hydroxy-2-naphthoic acid and 4-hydroxybenzoic acid. The copolymers have the CAS name 2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid, 6-hydroxy-, polymer with 4-hydroxybenzoic acid
FoodContactSubstance: Copolymers produced by the polymerization of 6-hydroxy-2-naphthoic acid and 4-hydroxybenzoic acid. The copolymers have the CAS name 2-naphthalenecarboxylic acid, 6-hydroxy-, polymer with 4-hydroxybenzoic acid (CAS Reg. No. 81843-52-9). The copolymers should be manufactured and characterized as described in the notification.
